channel.title: Comments on: NaNo is the Hour of Our Discontent
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: Whoa, We’re Halfway There (Through NaNoWriMo) – Luna Station Quarterly
item.dc:creator: Whoa, We’re Halfway There (Through NaNoWriMo) – Luna Station Quarterly
item.description: […] the one who told me to do it! I want to scream at him. You literally argued in our last post that I had no good reason to NOT do it, since I have all my projects outlined! This is your […]
